lines.text: Ah, Maximilian, how very good of you to be so punctual!
The name is Vandeveer. I don't wish to be on first name terms with anyone who's had their fingers up my rectum.
No, he hated Zoppi far too much to kill him.
Miss O'Brien, in Italy, finding someone you can really hate is as important as finding someone to love.
You do not suddenly kill someone you have spent years hating.
You have too big an investment in such a person.

[Berating a subordinate]
What next, the 'Andes Plane Crash Cookbook'?
I knew that divorce was too good to last!

[to Dr. Deere, about being dangerously overweight]
Cut down? I am what I am precisely because I've eaten my way to the top! I'm a work of art, created by the finest chefs in the world. Every fold is a brush stroke! Every crease a sonnet! Every chin a concerto! In short doctor darling, in my present form, I'm a masterpiece!
Don't tell me another cook has been murdered! Who is it this time, Aunt Jemima?
Come on, Nat, you don't consider a roll in the hay with your secretary adultery?
What do you call it, shorthand?
Won't it be fun, just the two of us in my kitchen!

[speaking to Natasha]
So much for the fun.
